name: Microcosm #22 PartyBidder
description:
**Microcosm #22 PartyBid NFT**
This image commemorates the DefMicroParty on October 7th, 2021, which collaboratively purchased "Microcosm #22" by Jen Stark for 4.4 ETH. 17 contributors worked together using [PartyBid.app](https://www.partybid.app/party/0x5dCc03D9A613E59db4751D1071dBAF3cAEDFFd30) and some [last minute hacks](https://jamiew.mirror.xyz/mmyoMdQM_qmK2vyOGAUZwzzAdhXwXHoIli7Zo0mLlog) and [custom frontends](https://defparty.netlify.app/). 
 $DEFMICRO tokens were issued to all wallets that contributed to the purchase, and any $DEFMICRO holder can claim this collectible NFT. 
 
 --- 
 #### References: 
 [Jen Stark's COSMOS collection (2021)](https://foundation.app/collection/cosmos) 
 
 [PartyBid by PartyDao](https://www.partybid.app/): See [DefMicroParty partybid contract instance](https://etherscan.io/token/0xdd75fed2b89fc0ed5a955f6856a44dcc9e453ae3). 
 
 [Fractional.art](https://fractional.art): 
 Fractional enables NFT owners to tokenize their assets, like the [DefMicroParty Vault](https://fractional.art/vaults/0xdd75fed2b89fc0ed5a955f6856a44dcc9e453ae3). 
 
 **Contract on Etherscan:** [PartyBid DefMicroParty](https://etherscan.io/address/0x5dCc03D9A613E59db4751D1071dBAF3cAEDFFd30). 
 
 This collectible is forked from [LivingDeadPunk](https://github.com/carlosgj94/punk2066-partybid) by [carlosg94](https://github.com/carlosgj94) and [msg](https://twitter.com/msg) â€“ thank you for sharing your work
